org.hibernate.search.batchindexing.spi

Interface MassIndexerWithTenant

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MassIndexer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MassIndexerImpl

    public interface MassIndexerWithTenant
extends MassIndexer
    A MassIndexer that can be assigned to a tenant in architectures with multi-tenancy.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MassIndexerWithTenant tenantIdentifier(String tenantIdentifier)
      Set the tenant that is associated to this MassIndexer.
